project_name: ACLU Together We Are Stronger Poster

ai_generation_instructions.description: Instructions optimized for AI comprehension based on training data
ai_generation_instructions.base_prompt: documentary photograph of diverse group of people marching together at a protest, professional photojournalism style, crowd of activists walking forward, determined expressions, outdoor daylight, wide shot showing many people, civil rights march atmosphere

color_palette.implementation_note: AI will approximate these as color categories, exact values applied in post-processing
color_palette.application: red, dark blue, and white - patriotic but bold

visual_style.treatment: modern engraving or high contrast duotone
characteristics: clear editorial/artistic treatment to prevent deepfake appearance
avoid: overly posed or stock photo appearance

typography.typeface: GT America Bold or Compressed Bold
typography.color: white on dark background or red/blue on light
typography.placement: top quarter of layout (applied in post-processing)

text_zone.content: TOGETHER WE ARE STRONGER text overlay
text_zone.note: Keep empty in AI generation, add text in post-processing

logo_placement.version: ACLU red or blue logo depending on background

post_processing_requirements.description: Elements that MUST be applied programmatically after AI generation

mandatory_steps.details: Convert to duotone or tritone using #ef404e (red) and #130f54 (dark navy)
Ensure image occupies bottom 75%, leave top 25% for text overlay
Place 'TOGETHER WE ARE STRONGER' in GT America Bold, all caps, in top section
High contrast treatment or modern engraving effect for artistic/editorial appearance
Place logo in bottom right corner with appropriate padding

quality_checks: Verify no deepfake appearance - must look clearly artistic/editorial
Ensure exact brand colors are applied
Confirm typography is legible and properly positioned
Check composition follows rule: image in bottom 3/4, text in top 1/4

ai_limitations: AI will NOT produce exact hex colors - only approximations
AI will NOT leave exact top 25% empty - requires post-crop
AI will NOT add text - must be added in post-processing
AI will NOT apply exact brand treatments - requires post-processing
success_factors: Use 'documentary photography' as base - aligns with AI training
Request 'diverse group' and 'crowd' - Tier 1 concepts AI understands
Apply stylization in post for brand consistency
Keep negative prompts minimal and binary
implementation_notes.expected_ai_output: Photojournalistic image of diverse people marching, some red and blue color elements, high contrast, no text
implementation_notes.final_result_after_post: Stylized poster with exact brand colors, proper typography, and ACLU visual identity
